tagline: An LLVM IR Editor plugin for Eclipse
body:
# LLVM IR Editor

This is the homepage of the LLVM IR Editor, an Eclipse plugin which adds a feature-rich LLVM IR editor.

Installation
============
Eclipse update site: http://amishne.github.com/llvm-ir-editor/update  
Manual download: TBD

Features
========
* Syntax highlighting
* Hover support
* Auto-completion
* Type checking
* and more; a full feature list will be listed here later
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: LLVM IR Editor
